tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  contact_number VARCHAR(20),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_personal_info (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR,
  last_name VARCHAR,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  address VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE patient_medical_history (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  blood_type VARCHAR,
  allergies VARCHAR,
  last_visit_date DATE,
  diagnosis VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE patient_personal_information (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR,
  last_name VARCHAR,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE medical_history (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES patient_personal_information(patient_id),
  diagnosis VARCHAR,
  date_of_diagnosis DATE,
  treatment_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE treatment_data (
  treatment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  treatment_name VARCHAR,
  dosage FLOAT,
  frequency VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(255),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalHistory (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  treatment_plan TEXT,
  treatment_start_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentData (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  record_id INT,
  treatment VARCHAR(100),
  dosage VARCHAR(50),
  treatment_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES MedicalHistory(record_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    admission_date DATE,
    discharge_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
    treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_name VARCHAR(100),
    treatment_description TEXT,
    treatment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Physicians (
    physician_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    physician_name VARCHAR(255),
    specialty VARCHAR(50),
    hospital_name VARCHAR(100),
    department VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE PredictiveModels (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(100),
    patient_id INT,
    prediction_result TEXT,
    prediction_date DATE
);
